body_html: Assigning to myself in the short-term until we have a final answer. If someone has a public build for 1.8 feel free to share in the short-term. The rub is do you do python 2, 3 both and do you also do mac and windows along with linux. :-) The matrix explodes fast.
body_text: Assigning to myself in the short-term until we have a final answer.  If someone has a public build for 1.8 feel free to share in the short-term.  The rub is do you do python 2, 3 both and do you also do mac and windows along with linux.  :-)  The matrix explodes fast.
body: Assigning to myself in the short-term until we have a final answer.  If someone has a public build for 1.8 feel free to share in the short-term.  The rub is do you do python 2, 3 both and do you also do mac and windows along with linux.  :-)  The matrix explodes fast.
